name: Backpacker's Pantry Pad Thai
description:
A traditional royal Thai favourite converted to outdoor use. Rice noodles, chicken flavoured textured vegetable protein (tvp) with a spicy, sweet and garlic sauce that has the crunch of roasted peanuts for texture and pizzazz!Serves 2-4.May not be suitable for all vegetarians.Note: peanuts and peanut butter are packed in a separate, sealed bag, to protect those with peanut allergies.Ingredients:rice noodle (rice flour and water), sauce (tomato, sugar, white vinegar (maltodextrin and distilled vinegar), savory soup base (maltodextrin, salt, autolyzed yeast extract, yeast extract, onion powder, silicon dioxide, turmeric extract (color), sunflower oil), garlic, lime juice powder (corn syrup, lime juice with lime oil), cilantro, crushed red chili pepper, salt), peanut butter (peanuts, evaporated cane juice, palm fruit oil, salt), roasted peanuts, organic textured soy protein, bell pepper, green onion.
